video.title: Goosebumps
video.synopsis: R.L. Stine's tales take on a life of their own in a series that combines original stories with adaptations drawn from the popular books.

episodes.synopsis: Lucy loves telling monster stories, but her family and friends are tired of her wild tales.
episodes.title: The Girl Who Cried Monster

episodes.synopsis: There's something creepy lurking beneath the kitchen sink. It may look and feel like a regular sponge, but it is no ordinary sponge -- it's alive!
episodes.title: It Came from Beneath the Kitchen Sink

episodes.synopsis: An eerie old cuckoo clock in Michael and Tara's house has mysterious powers and it's about to set back the hands of time ... forever.
episodes.title: The Cuckoo Clock of Doom

episodes.synopsis: Billy's summer camp is turning out to be a total nightmare. His fellow campers are disappearing one by one. Could the culprit be "the forbidden bunk"?
episodes.title: Welcome to Camp Nightmare Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Billy's summer camp is turning out to be a total nightmare. The counselors are weird. And who or what is this vicious beast everyone calls "Sabre"?
episodes.title: Welcome to Camp Nightmare Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When Brooke gets the lead in a school play about a phantom, she is thrilled -- until the nightmares begin.
episodes.title: Phantom of the Auditorium

episodes.synopsis: Jerry is excited about taking piano lessons on a piano he found at his new house. But there's something strange about his piano teacher, Dr. Shreek.
episodes.title: Piano Lessons Can Be Murder

episodes.synopsis: Larry Boyd is having a bad day. It's not just a bad day, it's a bad hair day: Suddenly, he's growing thick long hair on his arms and legs.
episodes.title: My Hairiest Adventure

episodes.synopsis: Margaret is really worried about her father. Since he lost his job, he spends all his time locked in the basement doing a little plant testing.
episodes.title: Stay Out of the Basement Part 1

episodes.synopsis: When their father's behavior grows increasingly more disturbing, Margaret and Casey fear that he's become completely unhinged -- and dangerous.
episodes.title: Stay Out of the Basement Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Uncle Ben, an archaeologist, plans to unearth the tomb of a prince. Superstition says that once disturbed, he will come back to life seeking revenge.
episodes.title: The Return of the Mummy

episodes.synopsis: A girl who can't seem to do anything right gets a chance to shine when she gets a dummy named Slappy. But there's something eerie about this dummy.
episodes.title: Night of the Living Dummy 2

episodes.synopsis: Greg is having fun taking pictures with the cool camera he found in the spooky old house -- until he realizes that the pictures are not what he shot.
episodes.title: Say Cheese and Die

episodes.synopsis: Duane and Stephanie love exploring Hill House, the most popular tourist attraction in town. It’s dark and scary and haunted, they say, by the 100-year-old ghost of a 13-year-old boy. A boy who lost his head! Duane and Stephanie must help him find his head – or else he’s going to have to borrow one of theirs!!
episodes.title: The Headless Ghost

episodes.synopsis: Samantha has found someone who will grant her 3 wishes. But now Sam's wishes are turning her life into a living nightmare!
episodes.title: Be Careful What You Wish For

episodes.synopsis: When Tim steals his favorite magician Amaz-O's secret bag of tricks, he gets more than he bargained for.
episodes.title: Bad Hare Day

episodes.synopsis: Eddie and Hat have dreamed up the perfect scare. They're going to lure Courtney to Muddy Creek and convince her that Mud Monsters are real.
episodes.title: You Can't Scare Me

episodes.synopsis: Todd Bastrow is obsessed with worms. That is, until his worms start playing tricks on their own.
episodes.title: Go Eat Worms

episodes.synopsis: Max and Noah discover a secret room in the attic with a mysterious mirror - a mirror with the power to make them invisible!
episodes.title: Let's Get Invisible

episodes.synopsis: Skipper's great comic collection includes his favorite, The Masked Mutant. One day, he discovers a building that looks like their secret headquarters.
episodes.title: Attack of the Mutant - Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Skipper's great comic collection includes his favorite, The Masked Mutant. One day, he discovers a building that looks like their secret headquarters.
episodes.title: Attack of the Mutant - Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Jerry's thrilled by the prospect of exploring the dark, spooky old cave he discovered- until he learns there's a 300-year-old ghost living inside it!
episodes.title: Ghost Beach

episodes.synopsis: During a stay at his weird Aunt Kathryn's, Evan is forbidden to go in one room. But when he decides to peek, he finds a can of Monster Blood!
episodes.title: Monster Blood - Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Evan thinks he's finally rid of the Monster Blood, the green slimy stuff with a monstrous appetite that he found at his weird Aunt Kathryn's house.
episodes.title: More Monster Blood

episodes.synopsis: Jodie loves visiting her grandparents' farm, but she and her brother Mark haven't been to the farm in a year, and it appears to have changed.
episodes.title: Scarecrow Walks at Midnight

episodes.synopsis: Joe's dad loves tacky lawn ornaments but when he brings home two hideous lawn gnomes with tall, pointy hats, it's not just embarrassing, it's spooky.
episodes.title: Revenge of the Lawn Gnomes

episodes.synopsis: Turns out the Renfields have a bat problem -a vampire bat problem!
episodes.title: Vampire Breath

episodes.synopsis: Drew and Walker's old friends, twins Shane and Shauna, are coming to visit. They have devised a spooky plan. It involves two scary pumpkin heads.
episodes.title: Attack of the Jack-O-Lanterns

episodes.synopsis: Gretchen and Clark's grandparents are really forgetful - they've gone out for the day and forgotten to mention that there's a monster locked upstairs!
episodes.title: How to Kill a Monster

episodes.synopsis: It looks like Ricky's lost, when he gets the creepy midnight calls!
episodes.title: Calling All Creeps

episodes.synopsis: Sam would've done his term paper on photosynthesis, but his fearless friend, Roxanne, insisted on doing it on the spookiest house in town.
episodes.title: My Best Friend is Invisible

episodes.synopsis: Zack just wrote a scary story about a giant pink, wet blob that terrorizes the neighborhood. As he starts typing, every word begins to come true!
episodes.title: The Blob That Ate Everyone

episodes.synopsis: When Jeff sees the mummy, with its hideous shrunken face rising from its sarcophagus, he thinks no one will believe him, especially his sister.
episodes.title: Don't Wake Mummy

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Saur gave Greg a big fat "F" on his report. He didn't believe Greg's scary story about the evil camera he found last summer and all that happened.
episodes.title: Say Cheese and Die Again

episodes.synopsis: When Erin's dad invites her and Marty to ride the new Shocker Studio's Tour Ride, the terrifying movie creatures become more life-like than ever.
episodes.title: Shocker on Shock Street

episodes.synopsis: When the Morris family gets lost on their way to Zoo Gardens Theme Park, they stumble upon another amusement park instead - Horrorland.
episodes.title: One Day at Horrorland - Part 1

episodes.synopsis: When the Morris family gets lost on their way to Zoo Gardens Theme Park, they stumble upon another amusement park instead - Horrorland.
episodes.title: One Day at Horrorland - Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Brian's parents just won't settle for anything less than perfect, so they send him away to "The Perfect School." Maybe a little too perfect!
episodes.title: Perfect School - Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Brian's parents just won't settle for anything less than perfect, so they send him away to "The Perfect School." Maybe a little too perfect!
episodes.title: Perfect School - Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Tom and his younger brother are being taken care of by their weird Aunt Dahlia. Her "prize prune cookies" are delicious but strange like her.
episodes.title: An Old Story

episodes.synopsis: Matt is sick of being the youngest in his family. One day, he finds that things are not quite the same, and begins to long for the good old days.
episodes.title: Don't Go to Sleep

episodes.synopsis: Chris is new kid in town and a perfect candidate for The Danger Club. He just has to spend an entire hour alone in the spooky haunted house!
episodes.title: The House of No Return

episodes.synopsis: Seth loves to channel-surf. But when he orders the sleek, futuristic-looking remote control, he soon finds that clicking isn't so much fun anymore.
episodes.title: Click

episodes.synopsis: When Alex hears scratching at the door, sees eerie footprints and strange shadows, he realizes that Wolf Creek is beginning to live up to its name.
episodes.title: Werewolf Skin - Part 1

episodes.synopsis: When Alex hears scratching at the door, sees eerie footprints and strange shadows, he realizes that Wolf Creek is beginning to live up to its name.
episodes.title: Werewolf Skin - Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Scary things are happening - eerie scratching noises and strange, raspy sounds coming from under Cooper's bed and those two evil-looking dogs.
episodes.title: Barking Ghost

episodes.synopsis: Nicholas wants to be a good brother to his new baby sister, Grace, but the little "bundle of joy" has been a real nightmare!
episodes.title: Strained Peas

episodes.synopsis: When Nadine and Jonathan find "The Haunted House Game" in the closet of a creepy old house, they soon realize that it's not just a board game.
episodes.title: Haunted House Game

episodes.synopsis: Becca starts longing for her desk when she discovers just how wild wildlife camp really is. The place is crawling with snakes - tons of them!
episodes.title: Teacher's Pet

episodes.synopsis: Slappy's back! When Slappy is mysteriously delivered to their house, Jillian and Katie's lives are suddenly turned upside down.
episodes.title: Bride of the Living Dummy

episodes.synopsis: Jessica, Matthew, and Todd, all lured by an eerie character named "Karl," are transported to a world where things are never what they appear to be.
episodes.title: Chillogy - Squeal of Fortune - Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Jessica, Matthew, and Todd, all lured by an eerie character named "Karl," are transported to a world where things are never what they appear to be.
episodes.title: Chillogy - Strike Three...You're Doomed - Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Jessica, Matthew, and Todd, all lured by an eerie character named "Karl," are transported to a world where things are never what they appear to be.
episodes.title: Chillogy - Escape From Karlsville - Part 3

episodes.synopsis: Dave just got a giant ant farm for his science project. When Dave decides to give the ants some real food, he now has a growing problem on his hands!
episodes.title: Awesome Ants

episodes.synopsis: Mark Rowe loves everything "jungle". When Mark receives a hideous shrunken head from his eccentric Aunt Benna, he becomes plagued with strange dreams.
episodes.title: How I Got My Shrunken Head- Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Mark Rowe loves everything "jungle". When Mark receives a hideous shrunken head from his eccentric Aunt Benna, he becomes plagued with strange dreams.
episodes.title: How I Got My Shrunken Head - Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Hannah's new neighborhood just got weird since that new boy moved in next door. But when did he move in? Wasn't the house empty the night before?
episodes.title: The Ghost Next Door - Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Hannah's new neighborhood just got weird since that new boy moved in next door. But when did he move in? Wasn't the house empty the night before?
episodes.title: The Ghost Next Door - Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Billy and Sheena are visiting their uncle on a Caribbean island. But when exploring under water, they find something's lurking deep below the sea.
episodes.title: Deep Trouble - Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Billy and Sheena are visiting their uncle on a Caribbean island. But when exploring under water, they find something's lurking deep below the sea.
episodes.title: Deep Trouble - Part 2

episodes.synopsis: I saw the cat sprawled on its back, its head twisted, its four paws straight up in the air. I knew that I had killed it again -for a third time.
episodes.title: Cry of the Cat - Part 1

episodes.synopsis: I saw the cat sprawled on its back, its head twisted, its four paws straight up in the air. I knew that I had killed it again -for a third time.
episodes.title: Cry of the Cat - Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Carly Beth will terrify everyone with the amazingly life-like horror mask she got from the creepy man at the novelty store.
episodes.title: The Haunted Mask - Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Carly Beth will terrify everyone with the amazingly life-like horror mask she got from the creepy man at the novelty store.
episodes.title: The Haunted Mask - Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Sue and her brother, Eddie, on vacation in London, take a tour of Terror Tower, a scary prison and torture chamber from medieval times.
episodes.title: A Night in Terror Tower - Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Sue and her brother, Eddie, on vacation in London, take a tour of Terror Tower, a scary prison and torture chamber from medieval times.
episodes.title: A Night in Terror Tower - Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Grady and Emily didn't want to move to the Florida swamps, but mom and dad, both scientists, said it would be "an adventure they would never forget.
episodes.title: The Werewolf of Fever Swamp - Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Grady and Emily didn't want to move to the Florida swamps, but mom and dad, both scientists, said it would be "an adventure they would never forget.
episodes.title: The Werewolf of Fever Swamp - Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Carly Beth Caldwell learned her lesson from the hideous mask she used to scare Steve Boswell last Halloween. Too bad Steve didn't learn his!
episodes.title: The Haunted Mask II - Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Carly Beth Caldwell learned her lesson from the hideous mask she used to scare Steve Boswell last Halloween. Too bad Steve didn't learn his!
episodes.title: The Haunted Mask II - Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Trina and her brother Dan think dad's dummies are pretty cool. Until one day they notice one of the dummy's hands is warm, humanly warm!
episodes.title: The Night of the Living Dummy III - Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Trina and her brother Dan think dad's dummies are pretty cool. Until one day they notice one of the dummy's hands is warm, humanly warm!
episodes.title: The Night of the Living Dummy III - Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Josh and Amanda don't want to live in Dark Falls but will have plenty of time to make new friends. Their neighbors want them to live there forever.
episodes.title: Welcome to the Dead House - Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Josh and Amanda don't want to live in Dark Falls but will have plenty of time to make new friends. Their neighbors want them to live there forever.
episodes.title: Welcome to the Dead House - Part 2
